displayName.text: Sts. Brigid's & Emeric's Roman Catholic Church

formattedAddress: 119 Avenue B, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 119 Avenue B, New York, NY 10009-5003, USA

originalText.text: Destroyed the neighborhood by renting their old school for huge amounts to the city as a migrant processing facility-

text.text: Destroyed the neighborhood by renting their old school for huge amounts to the city as a migrant processing facility-

originalText.text: Beautiful church nice people staff. clean surroundings and great place to make a party in the basement. Well kept thanks to the people that keep it up to date

text.text: Beautiful church nice people staff. clean surroundings and great place to make a party in the basement. Well kept thanks to the people that keep it up to date

originalText.text: We recently rented their basement for my daughter's  Baby Shower. It's a nice spacious location. Nice bathrooms which were spotless. Perfect place for a nice event . Unfortunately I can't say the same for their kitchen. We weren't able to use it at all. The refrigerators didn't work , neither of them. So we spent a ton of money on extra ice to keep drinks and foods that needed to be chilled cold. And we quickly found out that we couldn't keep any kind of food on the counters or anywhere in the kitchen because the roaches came out and attacked the trays as soon as you put them down. The only thing that saved our food was that they were wrapped to prevent leakage, if not we would have lost multiple trays of food. So we weren't able to use the kitchen at all. Which wasn't convenient but we did what we had to do. We spoke with the office and let them know the situation but they refused to refund us any part of the fees for the inconvenience which I thought was a little bit unreasonable considering we paid so much money for the rental. My daughter chose not to argue with them because she did not want to be disrespectful because they were a church. The fact that they are a church and didn't do the right thing is very very disappointing.

originalText.text: This church right here is suppose to be the house of the lord.  Guess what they did, my sister-in law rented there hall and now can't get her deposit back because, it's in a contract but yet it's the house of the lord. Not only that they lost everything in a fire homeless with proof and these so godly people won't refund her the deposit. Knowing she is homeless with 4 kids. This is why i never trusted the catholic churches for this same reason. It's a need and its not alittle bit of money it's alot. I'm very upset but just need to let you know what this church is about.. unexceptable   clearly because this is a time of need not just because we want to break the contract. They didn't even say we can see what we do for you. They just completely said NO... this is the house of the lord.. arent people suppose to go there for help and prayer or better yet confession..... this is why I don't trust church people... just sad had to share.

originalText.text: Nice community  and a Beautiful Church. Newly renovated. My favorite Church in the neighborhood. Everyone there is so nice! I love Father Francis dearly, I personally think he's the best priest in the whole wide world ❤
